: : Rodimus Prime : :
When Rodimus responded to Kenzo his voice sounded gruff, angry, and wild.
Rodimus Prime: Flicker was a spy! He has kidnapped Nightlight!
 CatMaster o <catmastero@...> wrote:--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus drives over a drop in the ground. Do to his speed he went
airborne. When in the air, Rodimus ran right through the wall of fire,
hitting the ground again. He barely slowed down, staying on course.
The Predacon reinforcements meant nothing to him.

Kenzo flew overhead in his helicopter mode "Whats going on Prime?!" 
He asked.  He had been lost through most of this ordeal.  "And what
can I do?"
